questions.question: What miracle did Jesus perform at a wedding in Cana?
Who was healed by simply touching the hem of Jesus' garment?
questions.answer: The woman with the issue of blood

questions.question: How many loaves and fish did Jesus use to feed 5,000 people?
Which miracle involved Jesus walking on water?
questions.answer: Jesus walking on the Sea of Galilee

questions.question: Who was brought back to life by Jesus after being dead for four days?
What did Jesus do to calm a storm on the Sea of Galilee?
questions.answer: He rebuked the wind and said to the waves, 'Peace! Be still!'

questions.question: Who did Jesus heal from blindness with mud and saliva?
Which miracle involved Jesus turning water into wine?
questions.answer: Jesus turning water into wine at the wedding in Cana

questions.question: Who did Jesus heal at the Pool of Bethesda?
questions.answer: A man who had been an invalid for 38 years

questions.question: What miracle did Jesus perform for Jairus' daughter?
questions.answer: He raised her from the dead

questions.question: How did Jesus provide a miraculous catch of fish for His disciples?
questions.answer: He told them to cast their net on the right side of the boat, and they caught a large number of fish

questions.question: Who was healed by Jesus at the city gate of Nain?
